mapper.insert: insert into review(num, title, u_id, content,origin,hotelname,rating,review_img) values (review_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{u_id}, #{content},review_seq.nextval,#{hotelname},#{rating},#{review_img})
mapper.select: select num,title, u_id, content,TO_CHAR(writedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')writedate, origin,groupnum,hotelname,rating,review_img from review where hotelname = #{hotelname} order by origin desc,groupnum asc
